def.threejs.three

Class Object3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • def.js.Object
      • def.threejs.three.EventDispatcher
        • def.threejs.three.Object3D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrowHelper, Bone, Camera, CSS3DObject, CubeCamera, DirectionalLightHelper, Group, HemisphereLightHelper, ImmediateRenderObject, LensFlare, Light, Line, LOD, Mesh, PointLightHelper, Points, Scene, SpotLightHelper, Sprite, TransformControls

    public class Object3D
extends EventDispatcher
    Base class for scene graph objects

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public double id
        Unique number of this object instance.

      • uuid

        public String uuid

      • name

        public String name
        Optional name of the object (doesn't need to be unique).

      • type

        public String type

      • parent

        public Object3D parent
        Object's parent in the scene graph.

      • children

        public Object3D[] children
        Array with object's children.

      • up

        public Vector3 up
        Up direction.

      • position

        public Vector3 position
        Object's local position.

      • rotation

        public Euler rotation
        Object's local rotation (Euler angles), in radians.

      • quaternion

        public Quaternion quaternion
        Global rotation.

      • scale

        public Vector3 scale
        Object's local scale.

      • modelViewMatrix

        public Matrix4 modelViewMatrix

      • normalMatrix

        public Matrix3 normalMatrix

      • matrix

        public Matrix4 matrix
        Local transform.

      • matrixWorld

        public Matrix4 matrixWorld
        The global transform of the object. If the Object3d has no parent, then it's identical to the local transform.

      • matrixAutoUpdate

        public Boolean matrixAutoUpdate
        When this is set, it calculates the matrix of position, (rotation or quaternion) and scale every frame and also recalculates the matrixWorld property.

      • matrixWorldNeedsUpdate

        public Boolean matrixWorldNeedsUpdate
        When this is set, it calculates the matrixWorld in that frame and resets this property to false.

      • layers

        public Layers layers

      • visible

        public Boolean visible
        Object gets rendered if true.

      • castShadow

        public Boolean castShadow
        Gets rendered into shadow map.

      • receiveShadow

        public Boolean receiveShadow
        Material gets baked in shadow receiving.

      • frustumCulled

        public Boolean frustumCulled
        When this is set, it checks every frame if the object is in the frustum of the camera. Otherwise the object gets drawn every frame even if it isn't visible.

      • renderOrder

        public double renderOrder

      • userData

        public Object userData
        An object that can be used to store custom data about the Object3d. It should not hold references to functions as these will not be cloned.

      • isObject3D

        public Boolean isObject3D
        Used to check whether this or derived classes are Object3Ds. Default is true. You should not change this, as it is used internally for optimisation.

      • onBeforeRender

        public jsweet.util.function.Consumer6<WebGLRenderer,Scene,Camera,jsweet.util.union.Union<Geometry,BufferGeometry>,Material,Group> onBeforeRender
        Calls before rendering object

      • onAfterRender

        public jsweet.util.function.Consumer6<WebGLRenderer,Scene,Camera,jsweet.util.union.Union<Geometry,BufferGeometry>,Material,Group> onAfterRender
        Calls after rendering object

      • DefaultUp

        public static Vector3 DefaultUp

      • DefaultMatrixAutoUpdate

        public static Boolean DefaultMatrixAutoUpdate

      • rotateOnAxis

        public Object3D rotateOnAxis(Vector3 axis,
                             double angle)
        Rotate an object along an axis in object space. The axis is assumed to be normalized.
        Parameters:
        axis - A normalized vector in object space.
        angle - The angle in radians.

      • rotateOnWorldAxis

        public Object3D rotateOnWorldAxis(Vector3 axis,
                                  double angle)
        Rotate an object along an axis in world space. The axis is assumed to be normalized. Method Assumes no rotated parent.
        Parameters:
        axis - A normalized vector in object space.
        angle - The angle in radians.

                                double distance)

        Parameters:
        vector - A world vector.

      • lookAt

        public void lookAt(Vector3 vector)
        Rotates object to face point in space.
        Parameters:
        vector - A world vector to look at.

        public Object3D getObjectById(double id)

        Parameters:
        id - Unique number of the object instance

      • getObjectByName

        public Object3D getObjectByName(String name)
        Searches through the object's children and returns the first with a matching name, optionally recursive.
        Parameters:
        name - String to match to the children's Object3d.name property.
